sentences.sentence: She turns to look at me seductively.
sentences.translation: 她转过头十分诱惑地看着我。

sentences.sentence: Blue arms flowed over his shoulders as a smooth tail coiled seductively around his waist.
sentences.translation: 蓝色的手臂如水般流过他的双肩，光滑的尾巴充满诱惑地绕住他的手腕。

sentences.sentence: While the Internet beckons brightly, seductively flashing an icon of knowledge-as-power, this nonplace lures us to surrender our time on earth.
sentences.translation: 当网络在搔首弄姿时，只是以知识为动力令人神往的图标。 这个虚构的地方，诱惑我们放弃在地球上的时间。
